A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bad movie. A bad sci-fi movie. And a bad Star Wars movie. Bad writing and directing... Full of plot holes. Bad jokes. Wasted opportunities for characters. Wasted opportunities for story progress. Poor performance of actors. Unnecessary and bad CGI usage. I felt like it was a joke after watching this. There will be no next time for me to watch this in a movie theater. Nope!
